name: Kawaii Potato VS Bad Rap Fat
name_original: Kawaii Potato VS Bad Rap Fat
description:
This game was made by Junkyard's Amethysts for the third big Gdevelop game jam. The theme was separation, so we did a game in witch the ennemies, the drops of bad rat fat separate and multiplie. They are green for some reason.

Controls :

Space to jump

Right to go right, Left to go left

Down to drop your weapon if you have one, but in every case you'll dive

Up to attack with your weapon.

Now, as a kawaii potato, go smash the drops of bad rat fats and hit them with a french frie or a peeler (or a katana ) !

Software used : Gdevelop, Piskel, Bosca Ceoil, Gimp, JFXR.

liluo link : https://liluo.io/rahan459/kawaii-potato
